thread.title: TRAVEL: All Metro services suspended between Bede and South Shields | Tyne Tees
thread.title_full: TRAVEL: All Metro services suspended between Bede and South Shields | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: TRAVEL: All Metro services suspended between Bede and South Shields | Tyne Tees
text:
Metro services are delayed at stations across the network Credit: ITV News Tyne Tees Metro services on South Tyneside are disrupted due to a trespass incident
All Metro services have been suspended between Bede and South Shields.
Passengers are being off-loaded from trains onto platforms at Pelaw.
Stations across the network are incredibly busy due to the Great North Run and Sunderland v Spurs at the Stadium of Light, with major delays expected to continue throughout the afternoon.
Passengers are being asked to get off the stationary trains due to the heat Credit: ITV News Tyne Tees Credit: ITV News Tyne Tees Last updated Sun 13 Sep 2015 Travel South Tyneside Metro Tyne and Wear Metro Tyne and Wear Sunderland Newcastle Gateshead
